item.title: Sensex and Nifty Rally as Oil & Gas Sector Leads; Small Caps Outperform
item.description: Indian equity markets closed higher on 31 Dec 2025, with the Nifty gaining 0.74% to settle at 26,129.60 and the Sensex advancing 0.64% to 85,220.60. Broad-based sectoral strength, led by the Oil & Gas segment, and robust market breadth underpinned the rally as investors positioned ahead of key corporate earnings and global cues. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Small and Micro Cap Stocks Deliver Exceptional Half-Year Returns Amid Bullish Market Sentiment
item.description: In a remarkable display of resilience and growth, select small and micro cap stocks have outperformed the broader market indices over the past six months, delivering extraordinary returns that have caught the attention of investors and analysts alike. These stocks, spanning sectors from FMCG to healthcare and metals, have not only surpassed benchmark returns but have also demonstrated strong technical and financial fundamentals underpinning their rally. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Small Cap Stocks Deliver Exceptional Returns Amid Market Volatility
item.description: In a remarkable display of market outperformance, several small-cap stocks have delivered extraordinary returns over the past year, with Cupid from the FMCG sector emerging as the standout performer, surging an impressive 584.08%. This exceptional growth dwarfs benchmark indices and highlights the potential rewards of focused small-cap investing amid evolving sector dynamics. Time: 2 hours ago
